titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C18

body.ab: <milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0015__main__19"/> I lay on my straw but I could not <lb n="c57-0015__main__20"/> sleep – I thought of the occurences of <lb n="c57-0015__main__21"/> the day.– What cheifly struck me was <lb n="c57-0015__main__22"/> the gentle manners of these people, and <lb n="c57-0015__main__23"/> I longed to join them but dared not.— <lb n="c57-0015__main__24"/> I remembered too well the treatment I <lb n="c57-0015__main__25"/> had suffered the night before fro<mdel>n</mdel>m<lb n="c57-0015__main__26"/> the barbarous villagers and resolved <lb n="c57-0015__main__27"/> whatever <del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2913__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2913__End"/><del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2916__Start"/>should<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2916__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>course of conduct I might<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2925__Start"/>afterwards<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2925__End"/><del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2928__Start"/>think it<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2928__End"/>hereafter consider<lb n="c57-0015__main__28"/><del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2934__Start"/>right to do<del loc="c57-0015__main__d1e2934__End"/>it proper to pursue that for the present I would <lb n="c57-0015__main__29"/> remain quietly in my hovel watching <lb n="c57-0015__main__30"/> and endeavouring to discover the motive<lb n="c57-0016__main__1"/> of their <del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2952__Start"/>motions<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2952__End"/> actions.—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0016__main__2"/> The<mdel>y</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>cottagers arose the next morning before <lb n="c57-0016__main__3"/> the sun;– The young woman arranged the <lb n="c57-0016__main__4"/> cottage &<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2977__Start"/>per<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2977__End"/> prepared the food; & the <lb n="c57-0016__main__5"/> youth mounted on a large strange animal <lb n="c57-0016__main__6"/><del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2983__Start"/>road<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2983__End"/> rode away. This day was passed in <lb n="c57-0016__main__7"/> the same routine <del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2991__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e2991__End"/>as the preceeding one. <lb n="c57-0016__main__8"/> The <del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3000__Start"/>young<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3000__End"/> young man was constantly <lb n="c57-0016__main__9"/> employed out of doors and the girl in <lb n="c57-0016__main__10"/> various laborious occupations within..— The old <lb n="c57-0016__main__11"/> man whom I soon perceived to be blind <lb n="c57-0016__main__12"/> employed his leisure hours in playing <lb n="c57-0016__main__13"/> on his instrument or in <del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3023__Start"/>pesively<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3023__End"/><lb n="c57-0016__main__14"/> contemplation – Nothing could exceed <lb n="c57-0016__main__15"/> the love & respect that the younger <lb n="c57-0016__main__16"/> cottagers <del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3035__Start"/>bore<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3035__End"/>shewed towards this venerable <lb n="c57-0016__main__17"/> old man – They performed towards <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>him every <lb n="c57-0016__main__18"/> little office of <del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3059__Start"/>love<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3059__End"/>affection& duty with gentleness; <lb n="c57-0016__main__19"/> and he rewarded them by his benevo <lb n="c57-0016__main__20"/> lent smiles. <del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3070__Start"/>B<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3070__End"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0016__main__21"/> They were not however entirely <lb n="c57-0016__main__22"/> happy–The <del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3079__Start"/>youth<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3079__End"/> young<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3082__Start"/>er<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3082__End"/> man<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3085__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3085__End"/>& his <lb n="c57-0016__main__23"/> companion, often retired into a corner <lb n="c57-0016__main__24"/> of their common room and wept. I saw <lb n="c57-0016__main__25"/> no cause for this unhappiness but <lb n="c57-0016__main__26"/> I was deeply affected by it – If such <lb n="c57-0016__main__27"/> lovely creatures were miserable it was <lb n="c57-0016__main__28"/> less strange that <del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3101__Start"/>alone<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3103__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3103__End"/><del loc="c57-0016__main__d1e3101__End"/> I, an imperfect <lb n="c57-0016__main__29"/> and solitary being should be wretched—<lb n="c57-0017__main__1"/> yet why were these gentle beings un <lb n="c57-0017__main__2"/> happy – they poss<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>essed a delightful house <lb n="c57-0017__main__3"/><lb n="c57-0017__left_margin__1"/>for such <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>it was <mdel>it</mdel><mdel>to</mdel>in my eyes) and every <lb n="c57-0017__main__4"/> luxury. they had a fire to warm <lb n="c57-0017__main__5"/> them when chill and delicious viands<lb n="c57-0017__main__6"/> when hungry– they were dressed <lb n="c57-0017__main__7"/><del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3170__Start"/>in clothes that kept t<del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3170__End"/> in excel <lb n="c57-0017__main__8"/> lent clothes and still more they enjoy <lb n="c57-0017__main__9"/> ed one anothers company & speech — and <del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3180__Start"/>saw<del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3180__End"/><lb n="c57-0017__main__10"/><lb n="c57-0017__left_margin__1"/>interchanged each day looks of affection & kindness– <lb n="c57-0017__main__11"/> What did their tears mean? Did they <lb n="c57-0017__main__12"/> really express pain? I was at first <lb n="c57-0017__main__13"/> unable to solve these questions but <lb n="c57-0017__main__14"/> perpetual attention and time <lb n="c57-0017__main__15"/> explained to me many of the appear <lb n="c57-0017__main__16"/> ances which at first seemed <lb n="c57-0017__main__17"/><del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3208__Start"/>igmmatic<del loc="c57-0017__main__d1e3208__End"/>enigmatic. <note> o you pretty Pecksie! </note><lb n="c57-0018__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0018.05" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 3<lb n="c57-0018__main__2"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3230__Start"/>It was some time<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3230__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>A considerable period elapsed before I discovered one <lb n="c57-0018__main__3"/><lb n="c57-0018__left_margin__1"/>of the causes of the uneasiness of this amiable <lb n="c57-0018__main__4"/> family – <mdel>It</mdel><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3260__Start"/>Itw<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3260__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>It was poverty– and they suffered <lb n="c57-0018__main__5"/> that evil in a very distressing degree– Dur <lb n="c57-0018__main__6"/> ring the winter<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3280__Start"/>They often had hardly any<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3280__End"/><lb n="c57-0018__main__7"/> their nourishment consisted entirely of bread <lb n="c57-0018__main__8"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3286__Start"/>and –<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3286__End"/> the vegetables of their garden and the <lb n="c57-0018__main__9"/> milk of one cow which gave very little <lb n="c57-0018__main__10"/> during the <del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3294__Start"/>hard<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3294__End"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3297__Start"/>monthes<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3297__End"/> winter when <lb n="c57-0018__main__11"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3301__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3301__End"/> its masters could <del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3305__Start"/>spare<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3305__End"/>scarcelyvery little <lb n="c57-0018__main__12"/> money towards the procur<mdel>i</mdel>e<mdel>ng</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>any<mdel>of</mdel> food for it. <lb n="c57-0018__main__13"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3344__Start"/>This state of poverty<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3344__End"/> They often I believe<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3347__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3347__End"/><lb n="c57-0018__main__14"/> suffered the pangs of hunger very poi <lb n="c57-0018__main__15"/> gnantly especially the two younger<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3363__Start"/>er part<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3363__End"/><lb n="c57-0018__main__16"/> for <metamark>^</metamark>several times they <del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3375__Start"/>often<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3375__End"/> placed food before the old <lb n="c57-0018__main__17"/> man when <del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3383__Start"/>they<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3383__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3390__Start"/>were<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3390__End"/><del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3395__Start"/>themselves in want of it<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3395__End"/><lb n="c57-0018__main__18"/> they had none for <del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3400__Start"/>their<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3400__End"/> themselves –This <lb n="c57-0018__main__19"/> trait of kindness moved me sensibly. <lb n="c57-0018__main__20"/> I had been accustomed during the night <lb n="c57-0018__main__21"/> to steal a part of their store for my <lb n="c57-0018__main__22"/> own consumption; but when I found <lb n="c57-0018__main__23"/> that in doing this I inflicted pain on the <lb n="c57-0018__main__24"/> cottagers, I abstained, and satisfied my <lb n="c57-0018__main__25"/> self with berries nuts and roots which <lb n="c57-0018__main__26"/> I <del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3423__Start"/>found<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3423__End"/><mdel>in</mdel>gathered from a neighbouring wood. I <del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3438__Start"/>found<del loc="c57-0018__main__d1e3438__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>discovered also <lb n="c57-0018__main__27"/> another means by which I was able <lb n="c57-0018__main__28"/> to assist their labours. I found that the<lb n="c57-0019__main__1"/> youth spent a great part of each <lb n="c57-0019__main__2"/> day in <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3462__Start"/>felling<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3462__End"/> collecting wood for the <lb n="c57-0019__main__3"/> family fire–and during the night I often <lb n="c57-0019__main__4"/> took his tools the <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3470__Start"/>com<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3470__End"/> use of which I <lb n="c57-0019__main__5"/> quickly discovered and brought home <lb n="c57-0019__main__6"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3477__Start"/>for them<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3477__End"/> firing sufficient <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>for the consumption<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3490__Start"/>f<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3490__End"/>o<mdel>r</mdel>f seve <lb n="c57-0019__main__7"/> ral days– <milestone unit="tei:p"/><metamark function="paragraph">[</metamark>I remember the first time that I <lb n="c57-0019__main__8"/> did this, the young woman who opened <lb n="c57-0019__main__9"/> the door in the morning <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3519__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3519__End"/>appeared greatly sur <lb n="c57-0019__main__10"/> prisedastonished to see a great pile of wood on <lb n="c57-0019__main__11"/> the outside – she said some words in a <lb n="c57-0019__main__12"/> loud voice, & presently the youth joined <lb n="c57-0019__main__13"/> her who also appeared astonished. <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3542__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3542__End"/><lb n="c57-0019__main__14"/> I observed <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3547__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3547__End"/> with pleasure that he <lb n="c57-0019__main__15"/> did not go to the <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3555__Start"/>wood<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3555__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>forest that day but <lb n="c57-0019__main__16"/> spent it in repairing the cottage & in <lb n="c57-0019__main__17"/> cultivating the garden.—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0019__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3576__Start"/>Soon after<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3576__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>By degrees also I made another discovery <lb n="c57-0019__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3590__Start"/>which was that<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3590__End"/><lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c57-0019__left_margin__d1e3598__Start"/>to me<del loc="c57-0019__left_margin__d1e3598__End"/> of still <lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__2"/> greater <lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__3"/> moment <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to me I <lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__4"/> found<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>that these people <mdel>ha</mdel><mdel>d</mdel>posessed a <lb n="c57-0019__main__20"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3646__Start"/>means<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3646__End"/>method of communicating their <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3654__Start"/>ideas<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3654__End"/>experience & to <lb n="c57-0019__main__21"/>feelings one another by articulate sounds which <lb n="c57-0019__main__22"/> they uttered <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3667__Start"/>som<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3667__End"/> —<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3672__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3672__End"/> I <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3675__Start"/>often<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3675__End"/> percieved that <lb n="c57-0019__main__23"/> the words they spoke <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sometimes produced plea <lb n="c57-0019__main__24"/> sure pain, smiles or sadness in the <lb n="c57-0019__main__25"/><lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__1"/>minds &countenances of the hear<mdel>ee</mdel>ers– This was <lb n="c57-0019__main__26"/> indeed a Godlike science and I ardently <lb n="c57-0019__main__27"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3718__Start"/>wished<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3718__End"/><lb n="c57-0019__left_margin__1"/>desired to become acquainted with it–But <lb n="c57-0019__main__28"/> I was baffled in every attempt <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3734__Start"/>they<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3734__End"/>I made for this purpose<lb n="c57-0019__main__29"/> Their pronunciation was quick & the <lb n="c57-0019__main__30"/> words they uttered <del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3748__Start"/>seemed<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3748__End"/><del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3752__Start"/>had<del loc="c57-0019__main__d1e3752__End"/> not having<lb n="c57-0020__main__1"/> any apparent <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3765__Start"/>co<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3765__End"/> connexion with <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3768__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3768__End"/> visible <lb n="c57-0020__main__2"/> objects I was unable to discover any clue <lb n="c57-0020__main__3"/> by which I could unrable the mystery <lb n="c57-0020__main__4"/> of their <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3780__Start"/>sounds.<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3780__End"/><del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3784__Start"/>application<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3784__End"/> reference.. By great application how <lb n="c57-0020__main__5"/> ever and after having remained <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>during the space of several <lb n="c57-0020__main__6"/> revolutions of the moon in my hovel <lb n="c57-0020__main__7"/> I discovered the names that were given <lb n="c57-0020__main__8"/> to some of the most familiar objects <lb n="c57-0020__main__9"/><lb n="c57-0020__left_margin__1"/>of discourse, I learned <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>& applied the words fire, <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3828__Start"/>milk<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3828__End"/>milk <lb n="c57-0020__main__10"/>bread&wood I learned also the names <lb n="c57-0020__main__11"/> of the cottagers themsel<mdel>f</mdel>ves– <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3853__Start"/>but as<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3853__End"/><lb n="c57-0020__main__12"/> the<mdel>y</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>youth & his companion had h each of them several but <lb n="c57-0020__main__13"/> the old man had only one which <lb n="c57-0020__main__14"/> was Father – the girl was call<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3883__Start"/>ed Sist<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3883__End"/><lb n="c57-0020__main__15"/> Sister or Agatha and the youth <lb n="c57-0020__main__16"/> Felix. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><mdel>or</mdel> brother or son I <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3902__Start"/>c<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3902__End"/> cannot describe the delight <lb n="c57-0020__main__17"/> I felt when I <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3910__Start"/>discovered<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3910__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>learned the ideas <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3921__Start"/>opp<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3921__End"/><lb n="c57-0020__main__18"/> appropriated to each of these sounds <lb n="c57-0020__main__19"/> and was able to pronounce them. <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3928__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3928__End"/><lb n="c57-0020__main__20"/> I <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3936__Start"/>learned<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3936__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>distinguished several other <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3947__Start"/>sounds<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3947__End"/> words <lb n="c57-0020__main__21"/> without being able <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>as yet to understand <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3962__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3962__End"/> or <lb n="c57-0020__main__22"/> apply them – <del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3968__Start"/>Among these<del loc="c57-0020__main__d1e3968__End"/> Such as good<lb n="c57-0020__main__23"/>dearest – unhappy.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0020__main__24"/> I spent the winter in this manner– <lb n="c57-0020__main__25"/> the gentle manners and beauty of the <lb n="c57-0020__main__26"/> cottagers greatly endeared them to me–When <lb n="c57-0020__main__27"/> they were unhappy I felt depressed and<lb n="c57-0021__main__1"/> I sympathized in their joys. I saw few <lb n="c57-0021__main__2"/> human beings besides them, and if <lb n="c57-0021__main__3"/> any other happened to enter the cottage <lb n="c57-0021__main__4"/> their harsh <del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4008__Start"/>and rud<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4008__End"/> manners & rude <lb n="c57-0021__main__5"/> gait only enhanced to me <del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4014__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4014__End"/><del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4017__Start"/>my friends<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4017__End"/><lb n="c57-0021__main__6"/> the superior advantages of my friends. <lb n="c57-0021__main__7"/> The <del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4028__Start"/>Father<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4028__End"/> old man, I could percieve, <lb n="c57-0021__main__8"/> often endeavoured to encourage his <lb n="c57-0021__main__9"/> children as I sometimes found that <lb n="c57-0021__main__10"/> he called them. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to cast off their melancholy. He would talk in <lb n="c57-0021__main__11"/> a cheerful accent with an <del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4052__Start"/>aspect<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4052__End"/>expression of<lb n="c57-0021__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4060__Start"/>godn<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4060__End"/> goodness that <del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4065__Start"/>even<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4065__End"/><del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4068__Start"/>gave<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4068__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><mdel>me</mdel><del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4078__Start"/>delight.<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4078__End"/>bestowed pleasure<lb n="c57-0021__main__13"/><lb n="c57-0021__left_margin__1"/>even on me; Agatha listened with respect– her eyes <lb n="c57-0021__main__14"/><del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4096__Start"/>f<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4096__End"/> sometimes filled with tears which <lb n="c57-0021__main__15"/><metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0021.02"></metamark><lb n="c57-0021__left_margin__1"/>she endeavoured towipe<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4109__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4109__End"/> away unpercieved but I general<lb n="c57-0021__main__16"/>ly found that her manners and tone <lb n="c57-0021__main__17"/> were more cheerful after having listen<lb n="c57-0021__main__18"/>end to <del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4128__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4128__End"/> the exhortations of her father <lb n="c57-0021__main__19"/> It was not thus with Felix. He was <lb n="c57-0021__main__20"/> always the saddest of the groupe And <lb n="c57-0021__main__21"/> even to my unpractised senses he <lb n="c57-0021__main__22"/> appeared to have suffered more <lb n="c57-0021__main__23"/> deeply than his friends. But if his <lb n="c57-0021__main__24"/> countenance was more sorrowful <lb n="c57-0021__main__25"/> his voice was more cheerful than <lb n="c57-0021__main__26"/><lb n="c57-0021__left_margin__1"/>that of his sister<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4154__Start"/>es<del loc="c57-0021__main__d1e4154__End"/> expecially when he <lb n="c57-0021__main__27"/> addressed the old man—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0022__main__1"/> I could mention innumerable instances <lb n="c57-0022__main__2"/> which although slight marked the <del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4172__Start"/>heart<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4172__End"/>dispositions<lb n="c57-0022__main__3"/><mdel>in</mdel><mdel>by</mdel>of<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4192__Start"/>which<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4192__End"/> these amiable cottagers shewed <lb n="c57-0022__main__4"/> their dispositions. In the midst of poverty <lb n="c57-0022__main__5"/> and want Felix carried with pleasure <lb n="c57-0022__main__6"/> to his sister the fist little white flower <lb n="c57-0022__main__7"/> that peeped out from beneath the <del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4215__Start"/>snow<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4215__End"/>snowy<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4222__Start"/>white<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4222__End"/> ground<lb n="c57-0022__main__8"/><lb n="c57-0022__left_margin__1"/>Early<mdel>I</mdel>in the morning <del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4244__Start"/>early<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4244__End"/> before <del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4248__Start"/>any of the<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4248__End"/><lb n="c57-0022__main__9"/> she had risen he had cleared away the <lb n="c57-0022__main__10"/> snow that obst<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ructed her path to the <lb n="c57-0022__main__11"/> milkhouse<mdel>–</mdel>; drew water from the well <lb n="c57-0022__main__12"/> and brought the wood from the <del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4281__Start"/><del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4282__Start"/>outhouse<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4282__End"/><del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4281__End"/><metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0022.05">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0022__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0022__left_margin__2"/> outhouse <lb n="c57-0022__left_margin__3"/> where to his <lb n="c57-0022__left_margin__4"/> perpetual <lb n="c57-0022__left_margin__5"/> astonishment <lb n="c57-0022__left_margin__6"/> he found his <lb n="c57-0022__left_margin__7"/> store always <lb n="c57-0022__left_margin__8"/> replenished by <lb n="c57-0022__left_margin__9"/> an invisible <lb n="c57-0022__left_margin__10"/> hand.<lb n="c57-0022__main__13"/> In the day I believe he worked sometimes <lb n="c57-0022__main__14"/> for a neighbouring farmer, <del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4325__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4325__End"/>because he <lb n="c57-0022__main__15"/> often went <del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4337__Start"/>out<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4337__End"/>forth, and did not return <lb n="c57-0022__main__16"/> untill dinner, yet brought no wood <lb n="c57-0022__main__17"/> with him:– at other times he worked <lb n="c57-0022__main__18"/> in the garden but as there was litt<mdel>e</mdel>le<lb n="c57-0022__main__19"/> to do in the frosty season he often <lb n="c57-0022__main__20"/> read to the old man and Agatha. <lb n="c57-0022__main__21"/> This reading had puzzled me extremely <lb n="c57-0022__main__22"/> at first – but by degrees I discovered <lb n="c57-0022__main__23"/> that he uttered many of the same <lb n="c57-0022__main__24"/> sounds when he read as when he talked; <lb n="c57-0022__main__25"/> I conjectured <del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4375__Start"/>their<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4375__End"/> therefore that he <lb n="c57-0022__main__26"/> found on the paper signs for speech <lb n="c57-0022__main__27"/> which he understood and I ardently longed <lb n="c57-0022__main__28"/> to <del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4386__Start"/>understand<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4386__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>comprehend these <del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4397__Start"/>b<del loc="c57-0022__main__d1e4397__End"/> also; but how was
